name: geomagnetic
content:

relating to the Earth's magnetic field (= an area around a magnet or something magnetic, in which it has a force to attract objects to itself): Satellites can be affected by geomagnetic disturbances. In 1859, a geomagnetic storm was so powerful that it melted telegraph wires across Europe and America.
More examplesFewer examplesAnimal navigation and migration dependent on the geomagnetic field may be affected.Scientists suggest a geomagnetic reversal takes thousands of years and does no harm.The hotel is directly underneath the earth's geomagnetic belt, which means during the winter you have a good chance of seeing the Northern Lights.
